item.description:
The Butch Taylor Band plays a mixture of the best dance music from the 70s and 80s, classic hits of the 50s and 60s, jazz standards, and some of the hippest covers of today!

The Connecticut based-group consists of bass, drums, guitar, keyboards, percussion, saxophone, and 2 front vocalists, all seasoned, professional musicians dedicated to playing a variety of musical styles. We now include a DJ service to provide continuous music throughout your party or event.

The Butch Taylor Band specializes in bringing the best, high-energy, professional music entertainment to your wedding, party or corporate function! If you need quality live entertainment, please contact us to discuss your particular needs

http://butchtaylor.co...









CONTE'S FISH MARKET
at the Westport Inn
1595 Post Road East
Westport, CT 06880
203 434-9786

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: The Butch Taylor Band @ Conte's in Westport
